subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort was built during the reign of Maharaja Pratap Singh?
question_hi: महाराजा प्रताप सिंह के नियमित राज्य में किया गया एक महत्त्वागंधर्म का नाम है।
explanation_en: Mehrangarh Fort was built during the reign of Maharaja Jaswant Singh II. It is located in Jodhpur, Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: मेहरांगर के नंबर के संवति में बनाया गया है। उसमें राजशांति में संग्रेसको बनाया गया है।
explanation_en: Jaipur was built during the reign of Maharaja Jaswant Singh II. It is located in Jaipur, Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: जापान में बनाया गया है। उसमें राजशांति में संग्रेसको बनाया गया है।
explanation_en: Jaipur was built during the reign of Maharaja Jaswant Singh II. It is located in Jaipur, Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: जापान में बनाया गया है। उसमें राजशांति में संग्रेसको बनाया गया है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
question_en: What is the most famous form of folk dance in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के तैयार कलाकारों का सबसे बड़े उद्यानाती काला का अभिप्रमाण है।

options.option_explanation_en: Ghoomar is a famous folk dance form originated from Jaisalmer, Rajasthan.
options.option_explanation_hi: Ghoomar is a popular folk dance form from Jaisalmer, Rajasthan.

options.option_explanation_en: Bishnoi Dance is a traditional dance form of the Bishnoi community in Rajasthan.
options.option_explanation_hi: Bishnoi Dance is a traditional dance form of Bishnoi community in Rajasthan.

options.option_explanation_en: Tadvi Dance is a traditional folk dance form of Kishangarh in Rajasthan.
options.option_explanation_hi: Tadvi Dance is a traditional folk dance form of Kishangarh in Rajasthan.

options.option_explanation_en: Teej Dance is a traditional dance form performed during Teej festival in Rajasthan.
options.option_explanation_hi: Teej Dance is a traditional dance form performed during Teej festival in Rajasthan.

options.option_explanation_en: Kalbelia Dance is a traditional dance form of Kalbelia tribe in Rajasthan.
options.option_explanation_hi: Kalbelia Dance is a traditional dance form of Kalbelia tribe in Rajasthan.
